entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -42.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
